LinkedIn.title: Update LinkedIn Profile
LinkedIn.description: Copy your CV information directly to your LinkedIn profile
LinkedIn.tipsContent: Remember to save your changes in your LinkedIn profile after each update. It's recommended to check the format before saving.
LinkedIn.openInNewTab: Profile will open in a new tab for convenient updating
LinkedIn.summaryDescription: A brief professional summary describing your experience and key skills
LinkedIn.experienceDescription: Details of your work experience, including positions, companies, and achievements
LinkedIn.educationDescription: Details of your education, including degrees, institutions, and fields of study
LinkedIn.skillsDescription: List of your professional and technical skills
LinkedIn.languagesDescription: List of languages you are proficient in
LinkedIn.saveReminder: Don't forget to click 'Save' in LinkedIn to ensure your updates are saved!
LinkedIn.updateSuccessDescription: Data updated directly in your LinkedIn profile
LinkedIn.updateErrorDescription: Could not update profile directly. Please copy and paste manually.
